attributes.action: Stop the option of a 2nd EU Referendum due to the Sore Losers of Remain Campaign
attributes.background: Due to the sore Losers of Remain Campaign, we must stop the chances of a 2nd EU Referendum and the talk of it possibly happening. It makes the UK look like we do not respect democracy and the peoples vote, and that we will continue to do this until they have their way and got the 'correct' outcome.
